data.author: Leah Busque
data.quote: I wake up every morning and think to myself, ‘how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours.’

data.author: Michele Ruiz
data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.

data.author: Joss Whedon
data.quote: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.

data.author: William W. Purkey
data.quote: You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth.

data.author: Neil Gaiman
data.quote: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.

data.author: Lewis Carroll
data.quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.

data.author: Socrates
data.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.

data.author: Dalai Lama XIV
data.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

data.author: Abraham Lincoln
data.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It’s what you’re made of. Not the circumstances.

data.author: Catherine Pulsifier
data.quote: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.

data.author: Isabelle Lafleche
data.quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.

data.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
data.quote: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Hold the vision, trust the process.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
